venue.address_2: Intersection of Mass Av & St Botolph Street
venue.name: Wheeler's Frozen Desserts

item.description:
Learn how marketers use social networking sites and viral marketing in their overall branding strategies, and how you can adapt these techniques to promote your own photography, graphic art, video, and animation, and music.

We'll have an open discussion of how group members are currently using social networking sites to share their art. The presenter will demonstrate two easy techniques anyone can use to share and distribute work samples to blogs and sites like Facebook - 1) using Google's FeedBurner to syndicate content and - 2) using Gigya's Wildfire service to create a widget for viral marketing.

We'll also have time for networking and to enjoy some tasty beverages and ice cream. The event will be limited to 12 members.

group.name: The Boston Digital Arts Meetup Group

item.name: Sharing your Work - Viral Marketing on Social Networks
